disobedience.question: Did I reject the unity of the Church when struggling to understand the human imperfections of its members during disagreements?

disobedience.description: Failing to advocate for proper burial of human remains is considered sinful as the Church teaches that the body is sacred and deserves reverent burial, with scattering or keeping remains being contrary to the dignity of the human body and resurrection belief.

disobedience.question: Did I schedule non-essential work on a Sunday, potentially disrespecting God's holy day of rest?
